acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle Singletons with parameters in the static method
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleSingletonsWithParametersInPublicStaticMethod

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.SingletonWithParametersInStaticFactoryPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the calendar object should not be null
Then the String field hhYwmeizsk cannot be null or empty

Then the List<?> <span class='step-parameter'>[OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 98 byteObjectField = 116 shortField = 71 shortObjectField = 70 charField = 1 charObjectField = j intField = 384425699 intObjectField = 2116666495 longField = 391514213258551 longObjectField = 391514213210914 floatField = 0.095944345 floatObjectField = 0.057139754 doubleField = 0.8885526597470902 doubleObjectField = 0.6370504842867434 stringField = FKFU0JDM6B objectField = java.lang.Object@67c492fc calendarField = Sun Jun 14 20:05:37 BST 2015 dateField = Sun Jun 14 20:05:37 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@2349aa88 intArray = [I@435df9a1 booleanArray = [Z@57e940ed bigDecimalField = 73357009471 ) should not be null and contain at least one non-empty element

Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{xyU1KMBmm5=OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 120 byteObjectField = 19 shortField = 1 shortObjectField = 126 charField = k charObjectField = k intField = -1198493258 intObjectField = -1045517529 longField = 391514217553960 longObjectField = 391514217516707 floatField = 0.8473349 floatObjectField = 0.5870683 doubleField = 0.9020897645903546 doubleObjectField = 0.7859110893161221 stringField = TCA78Yq39q objectField = java.lang.Object@67c492fc calendarField = Sun Jun 14 20:05:37 BST 2015 dateField = Sun Jun 14 20:05:37 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@637c004 intArray = [I@21ed2052 booleanArray = [Z@517ef60 bigDecimalField = 73357009471 ) should contain at least one non empty element
